input.sentences: my family and friends gathered for a dinner .
we had made gravy for the turkey .
my dad was carving it up .
we were all very excited to eat the food .
output.sentences: A girl took a photo with her boyfriend as her brother sat, staring at a recipe book.
Later on that day, family members arrived for the family the reunion.
The brother began wisking up a meal for his relatives.
He made many dishes, the chicken being the main dish.
After a long day of work, the food was all cooked and chicken sliced to perfection.
